geneVariantDescriptions.description: EWSR1-CREB3L1 results from the fusion of EWSR1 and CREB3L1 leading to upregulation of sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma-related genes including CD24 (PMID: 28939748) and therefore, is predicted to lead to a gain of protein function. EWSR1-CREB3L1 has been identified in small cell osteosarcoma (PMID: 21987447), sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma (PMID: 24441665), and low-grade fibromyxoid sarcoma (PMID: 23588368).

references.title: A novel EWSR1-CREB3L1 fusion transcript in a case of small cell osteosarcoma.
EWSR1-CREB3L1 gene fusion: a novel alternative molecular aberration of low-grade fibromyxoid sarcoma.
Recurrent EWSR1-CREB3L1 gene fusions in sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma.
In-depth Genetic Analysis of Sclerosing Epithelioid Fibrosarcoma Reveals Recurrent Genomic Alterations and Potential Treatment Targets.
